headline: AI Chips Update - Black Forest Labs Secures Series B For Visual AI Expansion
summary: Black Forest Labs has announced a $300 million Series B investment led by AMP and Salesforce Ventures, positioning the company to further its advancements in the realm of visual intelligence through its FLUX model family. Founded in 2024, Black Forest Labs has quickly established itself as a leader in this field, offering state-of-the-art multimodal systems that integrate perception, generation, and reasoning. Their models, which rank as leading text-to-image generators on platforms like...

headline: Stocks Set to Open Lower as Bond Yields Climb, U.S. PCE Inflation Data Awaited
summary: December S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESZ25) are down -0.57%, and December Nasdaq 100 E-Mini futures (NQZ25) are down -0.68% this morning, pointing to a lower open on Wall Street as Treasury yields climbed following hawkish comments from Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda.

headline: Should AMD Investors Worry About Google TPUs and the DRAM Shortage?
summary: Shares of Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ:AMD) have not had a good November, now down 18% in the past month, thanks in part to the AI valuation sell-off and a slew of developments that have impacted the semiconductor scene. headline: OpenAI Takes Stake in Thrive Holdings, Adding to Circular Deals
summary: Thrive Capital, one of OpenAI’s top investors, set up Thrive Holdings earlier this year with the goal of starting and acquiring companies that can benefit from artificial intelligence.  As part of the tie-up announced Monday, OpenAI will work with Thrive Holdings to speed up business adoption of AI, starting with accounting and IT services.  OpenAI plans to embed teams within Thrive Holdings’ companies “to boost speed, accuracy, and cost efficiency,” the companies said.

content.title: OpenAI Takes Stake in Thrive Holdings, Adding to Circular Deals
content.summary: Thrive Capital, one of OpenAI’s top investors, set up Thrive Holdings earlier this year with the goal of starting and acquiring companies that can benefit from artificial intelligence.  As part of the tie-up announced Monday, OpenAI will work with Thrive Holdings to speed up business adoption of AI, starting with accounting and IT services.  OpenAI plans to embed teams within Thrive Holdings’ companies “to boost speed, accuracy, and cost efficiency,” the companies said.

headline: OpenAI’s investment into Thrive Holdings is its latest circular deal
summary: Analysts will be watching to see if Thrive-owned firms actually succeed in building long-term profitable businesses using OpenAI’s tech, or if the result is really just pumped up valuations based on speculative market potential.

content.title: OpenAI’s investment into Thrive Holdings is its latest circular deal
content.summary: Analysts will be watching to see if Thrive-owned firms actually succeed in building long-term profitable businesses using OpenAI’s tech, or if the result is really just pumped up valuations based on speculative market potential.
